title: Support Requests Unanswered
body: Is it just me or has anyone else submitted a a support request and just received no help at all or none for a ridiculous period of time. I've recently been having issues with logging into my main account and the situation has progressed to the point where I'm unable to access my account at all. I submitted multiple requests last week and finally received an automated response stating that "a response would take longer than normal due to blah blah blah". I understand that I'm just one small member of the huge LOL community but I feel like issues that I face should at least be cared about...

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find any support requests from this account, but I want you to know we aren't trying to leave anyone behind! We've been pretty damn slammed with tickets recently, so response times are a bit longer than normal. This is why that automated message was sent out to let you know that.

Our specialists are busting their butts to get to everyone as quickly as possible, so if you hang on for just a bit longer, we'll have someone with you soon. I can't estimate how long it will be before someone gets back to you, but please let me know if you have any other questions.
